about_the_game:
Customize your pilot with this Vector 36 DLC racewear set.

Mars colonists, displeased with the current corporatocrate grip on commodities, band together in the wastelands. Over generations of colonists, they have become hardened to the harsh martian environment.

Helmet - Grit Colonist
Race Suit - Dust
